examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
$url = 'https://services.shopup.com/onamai/domains/DomainCreate';
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
$post_array = array(
 'token'=>'Token',
 'domainName'=>'simple.com',
 'period'=>'1',
 'autoRenew'=>'no',
 'proxyflg'=>'no',
 'ns'=>array(
  'ns1.netdesignhost.com',
  'ns2.netdesignhost.com'
 ),
 'regFname'=>'Sathaporn',
 'regLname'=>'Sukrammi',
 'regRole'=>'I',
 'regOrganization'=>'Shopup',
 'regCc'=>'TH',
 'regPc'=>'Bangkok',
 'regSp'=>'Bangkok',
 'regCity'=>'Bangkok',
 'regStreet1'=>'891 soi pachanarumit',
 'regPhone'=>'0853574703',
 'regEmail'=>'sathapornsukrammi@gmail.com',
 'admFname'=>'Sathaporn',
 'admLname'=>'Sukrammi',
 'admRole'=>'I',
 'admOrganization'=>'Shopup',
 'admCc'=>'TH',
 'admPc'=>'Bangkok',
 'admSp'=>'Bangkok',
 'admCity'=>'Bangkok',
 'admStreet1'=>'891 soi pachanarumit',
 'admPhone'=>'0853574703',
 'admEmail'=>'sathapornsukrammi@gmail.com',
 'tecFname'=>'Sathaporn',
 'tecLname'=>'Sukrammi',
 'tecRole'=>'I',
 'tecOrganization'=>'Shopup',
 'tecCc'=>'TH',
 'tecPc'=>'Bangkok',
 'tecSp'=>'Bangkok',
 'tecCity'=>'Bangkok',
 'tecStreet1'=>'891 soi pachanarumit',
 'tecPhone'=>'0853574703',
 'tecEmail'=>'sathapornsukrammi@gmail.com',
 'bilFname'=>'Sathaporn',
 'bilLname'=>'Sukrammi',
 'bilRole'=>'I',
 'bilOrganization'=>'Shopup',
 'bilCc'=>'TH',
 'bilPc'=>'Bangkok',
 'bilSp'=>'Bangkok',
 'bilCity'=>'Bangkok',
 'bilStreet1'=>'891 soi pachanarumit',
 'bilPhone'=>'0853574703',
 'bilEmail'=>'sathapornsukrammi@gmail.com',
);
$post_array = http_build_query($post_array);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $post_array);
$output = curl_exec($ch);
